name: Slime Rancher: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Slime Rancher is a charming, first-person, video game experience. Play as Beatrix LeBeau: a plucky, young rancher who sets out for a life a thousand light years away from Earth on the ‘Far, Far Range’ to stake a claim and make her fortune wrangling slimes.

Slime Rancher: Deluxe Edition includes:

- Physical Base game
- DLC: Secret Style Pack
- DLC: Fashion Play-set Physical Pack-In
- Slimepedia Booklet
- Redeemable codes for Bandcamp Original Game Soundtrack 1 & 2
